  16. (* Compare two bytecode executables for equality.
  17.    Ignore loader prefix and debug infos. *)

  19. open Printf

  21. ‌type cmpresult = Same | Differ of int

  23. ‌let rec cmpbytes ic1 ic2 len ofs =
  24.   if len <= 0 then Same else begin
  25.     let c1 = input_char ic1 and c2 = input_char ic2 in
  26.     if c1 = c2 then cmpbytes ic1 ic2 (len - 1) (ofs + 1) else Differ ofs
  27.   end

  29. ‌let skip_section (name : Bytesections.Name.t) =
  30.   match name with
  31.   | DBUG -> true
  32.   | _ -> false

  34. ‌let cmpbyt file1 file2 =
  35.   let open Bytesections in
  36.   let ic1 = open_in_bin file1 in
  37.   let toc1 = Bytesections.read_toc ic1 |> Bytesections.all in
  38.   let ic2 = open_in_bin file2 in
  39.   let toc2 = Bytesections.read_toc ic2 |> Bytesections.all in
  40.   let rec cmpsections t1 t2 =
  41.     match t1, t2 with
  42.     | [], [] ->
  43.         true
  44.     | s1 :: t1, t2  when skip_section s1.name ->
  45.         cmpsections t1 t2
  46.     | t1, s2 :: t2  when skip_section s2.name ->
  47.         cmpsections t1 t2
  48.     | [], _  ->
  49.         eprintf "%s has more sections than %s\n" file2 file1;
  50.         false
  51.     | _,  [] ->
  52.         eprintf "%s has more sections than %s\n" file1 file2;
  53.         false
  54.     | s1 :: t1, s2 :: t2 ->
  55.         let name1 = Bytesections.Name.to_string s1.name
  56.         and name2 = Bytesections.Name.to_string s2.name in
  57.         if name1 <> name2 then begin
  58.           eprintf "Section mismatch: %s (in %s) / %s (in %s)\n"
  59.                   name1 file1 name2 file2;
  60.           false
  61.         end else if s1.len <> s2.len then begin
  62.           eprintf "Length of section %s differ: %d (in %s) / %d (in %s)\n"
  63.                   name1 s1.len file1 s2.len file2;
  64.           false
  65.         end else begin
  66.           seek_in ic1 s1.pos;
  67.           seek_in ic2 s2.pos;
  68.           match cmpbytes ic1 ic2 s1.len 0 with
  69.           | Differ ofs ->
  70.               eprintf "Files %s and %s differ: section %s, offset %d\n"
  71.                       file1 file2 name1 ofs;
  72.               false
  73.           | Same ->
  74.               cmpsections t1 t2
  75.         end
  76.   in
  77.   let res = cmpsections toc1 toc2 in
  78.   close_in ic1; close_in ic2;
  79.   res

  81. ‌let main () =
  82.   if Array.length Sys.argv <> 3 then begin
  83.     eprintf "Usage: cmpbyt <file 1> <file 2>\n";
  84.     exit 2
  85.   end;
  86.   if cmpbyt Sys.argv.(1) Sys.argv.(2) then exit 0 else exit 1

  88. let _ = main ()
